name: Movies of Meryl Streep Online Quiz | People Themed | 10 Questions

questions.text: Streep had one of her earlier roles in 'The Seduction of Joe Tynan'. Who played the title character?
Streep starred in 'The French Lieutenant's Woman'. Who was the author of the novel?
questions.explanation:
John Fowles.

	Not his best novel - and a very annoying movie.

questions.text: One of Streep's less successful movies was 'Before and After'. In it, her son is accused of ...?
questions.explanation:
Murder.

	Did he or didn't he do it? The movie tanked.

questions.text: Streep starred in 'Dancing at Lughnasa'. Where is Lughnasa?
Streep's co-star in 'Ironweed' also co-starred with her in which of the following movies?
questions.explanation:
Heartburn.

	It was Jack Nicholson in both. Eastwood was in 'Madison' and Hoffman was in 'Kramer'.

questions.text: Streep had a more rugged role in 'The River Wild'. Who plays the villain?
In 'Out of Africa' Streep's character engages in what activity?
questions.explanation:
Writer.

	Isak Dinesen was the author.

questions.text: Streep plays the title role in the true story of 'Silkwood', a worker at a nuclear facility. Where was the facility located?
Streep starred in 'Sophie's Choice'. Who wrote the novel?
questions.explanation:
William Styron.

	Horrors of World War II.

questions.text: Which of these is NOT a movie which has Meryl Streep in the cast?
questions.explanation:
On Golden Pond.

	That one was Jane Fonda (and others).
